## Create Matrix

Create a matrix which looks as follows:

```{r, echo = FALSE}
x <- matrix(nrow = 3, ncol = 3)
print(x)
```

**Store** the matrix on an **object named** `x`. 
Note that it is important that the object is called `x`
as, if not, the check will fail.
